nodes.text: Kwazel candy was a type of plant native to the swamps of the planet Rodia, which were also home to the creature known as the Kwazel Maw. The plants consisted of bioluminescence green bulbs on brown vines and grew deep under the surface of the water. During the Clone Wars, the Gungan Jar Jar Binks swam through kwazel candy beneath the Rodian Senatorial Palace after being attacked by Separatist forces. Amongst the plants he encountered the Kwazel Maw nicknamed Bogey, who he ultimately used to defeat the Separatists.

Kwazel candy first appeared in "Bombad Jedi," the eighth episode of the first season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars television show, which aired on November 21, 2008. It was first identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
